page.title: 05A day in the life of Paul
page.content: In the morning my mini T.V with radio wakes me up because the T.V has got an alarm.I get dressed,eat my breakfast and watch T.V am.I say goodbye to my mum,get my bike out,call for Adam,Chris.I meet Nicholas and Decoy at Chris's house,talk,then go to school.We play football till the bell goes and then I go to regristration.We go to our first lesson at 9.30 .After that we have break and then go for another lesson.Then we have dinner, then we have another 4 more lessons.I go home on my bike.Get changed,play on my computer.I usalily have tea.I watch T.V. or I go out to play with my friends.Then I go to bed. By Paul Johnson 11yrs
